title: $500 OFF 2-Bedrooms With July Move In-Alief
posting_body: For leasing info call or text
At the edge of Richmond, Texas, The community is a quiet escape with modern amenities and sleek style.
The gated community provides an outdoor oasis with a resort-style pool, yard games, BBQ grills, and a lounge area with a fireplace.
Luxury apartments feature sophisticated elements like European-style wood cabinetry, quartz countertops, and wood floors throughout.
An outside dog wash and run and fitness center offer convenience while the business and conference center make working from home a breeze.
Surrounded by great shopping and dining, These apartments put you at the center of it all.
And with easy access to WestPark Toll Road, Highway 6 and The Grand Parkway nearby, accessing Downtown Houston is easier than ever.
Resort Style Pool with In-Pool Seating, Waterfall and Fountains
Outdoor Ping Pong Tables & Cornhole Lawn
Gazebo with Fireplace and Resident Lounge Seating
Flex Fitness Room with Yoga, Spin Cycles and the Mirror Virtual Fitness
